2. **Fly with American Airlines and its partners**: Earn miles when you fly with American Airlines, as well as its partner airlines, such as British Airways, Iberia, and Finnair.

4. **Take advantage of promotions**: Keep an eye on American Airlines' website and social media for promotions and limited-time offers that can help you earn more miles.
5. **Track your miles**: Regularly check your AAdvantage account to ensure your miles are being credited correctly.
